entry.title: The Ethereum Merge Resistors: Can They Succeed?
entry.summary: A prominent Ethereum miner has now gained a notable ally in resisting the merge and forking ETH. How far can they go?

entry.title: Near Protocol Discloses Wallet Breach That May Have Exposed Private Keys
entry.summary: After this week’s Solana wallet hack saga, Near shares details of a potentially similar issue that it said was fixed back in June.

entry.title: Nomad Recovers $22M of $190M in Ethereum Tokens Stolen in Hack
entry.summary: The token bridge project said it wouldn’t take legal action against white hat hackers who return the funds.

entry.title: India’s Financial Watchdog Freezes Binance-Owned WazirX’s Assets for ‘Lax KYC Norms’
entry.summary: Indian law enforcement claimed a WazirX director was allegedly “non-cooperative” after accusations of assisted fraud and money laundering.

entry.title: Coinbase Made 'False and Misleading Statements' About Its Business, Lawsuits Allege
entry.summary: America’s largest crypto exchange is facing two more class action lawsuits over the losses suffered by investors in the company’s stock.

entry.title: Bankrupt Crypto Broker Voyager Digital Approved to Return $270 million to Clients
entry.summary: As for the remaining assets, crypto broker Voyager Digital said that the bankruptcy estate will distribute the funds to creditors.

entry.title: Fintech Unicorn Revolut Still ‘Bullish on Crypto’ Amid Fresh Hiring Spree
entry.summary: Among the many financial and crypto companies looking to cut back, Revolut has emerged as one of the few firms adding to its headcount.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey's Block Reports $36M Impairment Loss on Bitcoin Holdings
entry.summary: Amid the continued crypto winter, Block’s total revenue fell by about 6% alongside a hefty impairment loss on its Bitcoin holdings.

entry.title: Halliday Raises $6 Million for 'Buy Now, Pay Later' Ethereum NFTs
entry.summary: As play-to-earn games become more popular, new services aim to alleviate the high cost of getting started.

entry.title: Binance and Mastercard Launch Bitcoin Rewards Card in Argentina
entry.summary: Argentina is the first country in the region to have the card.

entry.title: Why Ethereum NFT Creators Are Giving Away Commercial Rights—To Everyone
entry.summary: As Moonbirds and XCOPY artwork both transition to CC0 licenses, here’s a look at why creators are embracing the public domain.

entry.title: Why Musician and Ethereum NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Is Skeptical of Music NFTs
entry.summary: “There’s always a little bit of humor in my art. There’s always a little bit of sarcasm.”

entry.title: Senator Warren Wants OCC to Withdraw Crypto Guidance for Banks: Report
entry.summary: The Senator from Massachusetts is mustering support for a letter that aims to change rules for banks dealing with crypto.

entry.title: Justin Sun’s Poloniex Will Support Ethereum Proof-of-Work Fork
entry.summary: The crypto exchange announced that it will begin listing ETH fork ETHW next week.

entry.title: Instagram Adds Flow Blockchain NFTs, FLOW Token Pumps 44%
entry.summary: Instagram’s NFT initiative now includes more than 100 countries, including collectibles from the Flow blockchain.

entry.title: Coinbase Scores Deal with BlackRock to Give Aladdin Customers Bitcoin Access
entry.summary: A high-profile partnership with the world’s largest asset manager shows institutional interest in crypto even amid the bear market.

entry.title: Tinder Owner Ghosts Metaverse and In-App Currencies
entry.summary: ‘We’re early,’ as the crypto adage has it. Perhaps too early, says Tinder’s parent company Match Group, as it drops its metaverse plans.

entry.title: Coinbase Turns to Supreme Court to Settle Lawsuits From Account Holders
entry.summary: Coinbase has reportedly asked the U.S. Supreme Court for an emergency intervention to send two recently filed lawsuits to arbitration.

entry.title: British Bipartisan Group Launches Inquiry Into Regulating Crypto
entry.summary: Led by chairperson Lisa Cameron, the APPG is seeking recommendations into how best to regulate crypto in the UK.

entry.title: What is Yuga Labs’ Otherside? Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club Metaverse
entry.summary: The creators of Bored Ape Yacht Club are behind ApeCoin-powered metaverse platform Otherside. Here’s how it works.

entry.title: Cross-Chain Crypto Bridge Hacks Hit $2 Billion: Chainalysis
entry.summary: Chainalysis reported that 69% of all stolen crypto funds this year came from hacking protocols that bridge different blockchains.

entry.title: Token Backing Ethereum Scaling Solution Optimism Rallies 20%
entry.summary: There’s a new winner in town, and this time round, it’s the token underpinning Ethereum layer-2 scaling solution Optimism.

entry.title: Starbucks Teases Web3 Updates to Its Popular Rewards Program
entry.summary: The global coffee company looks to digital collectibles and to better engage customers.

entry.title: How Solana Vigilantes Battled Back Against the Wallet Hacker
entry.summary: Amid the early chaos and confusion of the Solana wallet hack, white-hat hackers took matters into their own hands to slow down the attack.

entry.title: Bitcoin Pioneer Jeff Garzik Launches Web3 Production Company
entry.summary: The new media outfit aims to tell stories from the intersection of Sci-Fi and Web3.

entry.title: CEO of Bankrupt Voyager Sold $30M in Company Shares Near Stock’s Peak in 2021: CNBC
entry.summary: It’s not unusual or incriminating for a CEO to sell company shares, but Voyager’s bankruptcy gives the sale new context.

entry.title: Solana Hack Blamed on Slope Mobile Wallet Exploit
entry.summary: Private keys may have been inadvertently compromised as a Solana mobile wallet is fingered for the major network attack.

entry.title: Coinbase Ex-Product Manager Pleads Not Guilty to Insider Trading
entry.summary: Ishan Wahi has been charged with wire fraud in connection with an alleged insider-trading scheme.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Riot Earned $9.5M for Shutting Down During Texas Heatwave
entry.summary: Based on Bitcoin’s average price in July, Riot received the equivalent of 439 Bitcoin for helping the state with its energy crisis.

entry.title: Why Musician and NFT Artist Jimmy Edgar Remains Skeptical on Music NFTs
entry.summary: Musician and NFT artist Jimmy Edgar is fully sold on NFT art, but not convinced yet on the uses of NFTs in the music world, he told Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Avalanche's John Wu Talks Institutional Interest and Use Cases
entry.summary: Ava Labs President John Wu sits for an extensive chat about institutional interest in crypto and DeFi (it has "absolutely not waned") and use cases of Avalanche with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Avalanche House in Brooklyn on July 15, 2022.

entry.title: Nearly $5M Swiped From Self-Proclaimed ‘World’s Most Secure’ Exchange ZB.com
entry.summary: The funds went missing from the crypto exchange’s hot wallet on Tuesday.

entry.title: Senate Bill Would Give CFTC ‘Exclusive Oversight’ of Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: The proposal introduces regulatory rules and a definition for what could be considered a “digital commodity.”

entry.title: From Ceramic Tiles to Generative NFTs: Art Blocks Founder’s Origin Story
entry.summary: Erick Calderon a.k.a. “Snowfro” tells Decrypt about his journey into crypto, and what’s next for Art Blocks.

entry.title: Solana Wallet Hack: Here’s What We Know So Far
entry.summary: Nearly $4.5 million worth of tokens have been drained from thousands of Solana wallets since Tuesday night. Here’s the latest.

entry.title: Polkadot Parachain Astar Turns to Alchemy's Crypto API in New Tie-Up
entry.summary: Astar Network is now the first project within the Polkadot ecosystem to let developers build apps using Alchemy Supernode crypto API.

entry.title: How Crypto and Esports Are Fueling Each Other’s Growth
entry.summary: From top-dollar sponsorships to NFTs, fan tokens, and tournaments for Web3 games, the industries are increasingly intertwined.

entry.title: Robinhood April Cuts ‘Did Not Go Far Enough’ Says CEO Amid New Layoffs
entry.summary: Robinhood has laid off almost a quarter of its staff amid turbulent markets—months after laying off another nine percent.

entry.title: DeFi Tokens Lido, Synthetix Rally as Crypto Markets Trade Sideways
entry.summary: Amid mixed market moves, DeFi tokens Lido and Synthetix have both posted hefty gains over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Ethereum Name Service Domain Registrations Hit All-Time High as Merge Approaches
entry.summary: More than 1.8 million ENS Domain names have been registered, and adoption by non-English speaking communities are rising.

entry.title: Solana, USDC Drained From Wallets in Attack
entry.summary: More than 5,000 wallets have been drained of millions of dollars. Solana's price plunged within hours.

entry.title: Meet Crypto Twitter’s Latest Meme: ‘Let’s Form Group!’
entry.summary: A Forbes contributor unwittingly creates the next “HODL.”

entry.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’
entry.summary:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash.
Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.

entry.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.

entry.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs
entry.summary: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.

entry.title: Matthew Ball on the Role of Crypto and NFTs in the Metaverse
entry.summary: The former Amazon Studios exec and venture capitalist spoke with Decrypt’s Kate Irwin about how crypto fits into the metaverse at an event in Beverly Hills, California.

entry.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory
entry.summary: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.

entry.title: Chelsea Manning Talks Crypto, Privacy, and Security
entry.summary: Chelsea Manning, who gave classified documents regarding the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq to WikiLeaks in 2010, talked to Decrypt's Stacy Elliott about crypto and privacy, decentralization and government, and her work with Nym.

entry.title: Binance CEO CZ on Crypto Bailouts and the Deals He Would Not Do
entry.summary: In an interview for Decrypt's gm podcast, CZ laid out Binance's approach to "bailouts" amid the crypto liquidity crunch, and criticized Alameda's complicated lifeline to Voyager.
